Hamilton Beach Electric Stand Mixer, 4 Quarts, Dough Hook, Flat Beater Attachments, Splash Guard 7 Speeds with Whisk, Silver

The stand mixer's planetary mixing action rotates the beaters around the sides of the included 4 quart stainless steel bowl so you don't have to scrape the sides. The stand mixer has 7 speeds and a mixing guide that helps you choose the right speed for the job. The slow first speed is great for kneading bread and reducing splatter when adding dry ingredients to wet ingredients. High speed perfectly whips cream or meringue. The mixer performs better than two-beater stand mixers and features the tilt-back head design for easy access to the bowl to add ingredients. The tilting action also makes it easy to quickly change attachments. Go from slowly folding in ingredients to whipping at top speed Versatile with 7 speeds, a slow first speed and a mixing guide Same rotating mixing action as other leading brands Includes 4 quart stainless steel bowl with handles, splash guard, dough hook, whisk and flat beater that are all dishwasher safe Built-in mixer handle makes it easy to lift, move and store.
